title: What were the biggest technological advances? - Quora

response.answer_text: For me, the most three significant advancements in technology are the computer, Telephone, and the Camera. As we can see nowadays Computer has evolved so much in terms of its physical appearance, features, and specifications. With regards to the Telephone, we started from attached but now we have a wireless phone. The mobile phone came from the idea of the telephone to make it handier. Mobile phone evolves so much like within a year manufacturing companies launch different Models of mobile phone. Companies always come up with a certain feature that makes our life easier. The Camera on the other hand, from film cameras to an auto digital Camera. Aside from that Digital Cameras nowadays can even capture up to the tiniest object. We can also edit the photo taken from a digital camera with the help of Photoshop, AI and another online app. Moreover, part of building those technologies and other applications is the quality of Electronic Components and Packaging.
In the modern world: Integrated circuits Think about your daily life and everything you use. It most likely has an IC of some kind in it.
